trans-unit.source: Contains properties for a script block being parsed.
During page parsing, information about a script block is stored in the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> class.
This class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.SimpleWebHandlerParser> class.
<xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo"></xref> class.
To use the properties of a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> instance, use the constructor overload that takes parameters.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo"></xref> class with parameters for initializing the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartLine"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartColumn"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartGeneratedColumn"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.CodeLength"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.IsCodeNugget"></xref> properties.
The starting line of a script block in an .aspx file.
The starting column of a script block in an .aspx file.
The starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
The length of the script block.
A value indicating whether the script block is located inside <% %> tags.
Gets the length of the script block.
The length of the script block.
Gets a value indicating whether the script block is located inside <% %> tags.
Code located within the \<% %> tags is referred to as a "nugget".
`true` if the script block is contained inside <% %> tags; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the starting column of a script block in an .aspx file.
The starting column of a script block in an .aspx file.
Gets the starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
The starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
Gets the starting line of a script block in an .aspx file.
The starting line of a script block in an .aspx file.
